course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Business Study Trip
course.description: This course is offered in the form of a study trip to another country in the winter and summer term.  Each study trip will consist of at least three elements, namely lectures delivered by faculty members at the host institution, company visits and cultural adventure in the host country.  Approval from the course coordinator is needed prior to enrolling in the course.  Graded P or F.
